Verify the answer content is initially hidden
Verify the answer content becomes visible upon clicking the question, expanding with a transition duration of 0.3s
Verify the 'Search FAQ' input field has placeholder 'Search for answers' and a width of 300px
Verify the text alignment of the answer content is left
Navigate to 'https://www.example.com/booking'
Verify the 'Select Date' input field displays the current date in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format
Verify the selected date in the date picker has background color #007bff and text color #ffffff
Verify the 'Next Month' button's aria-label is 'Go to next month'
Verify the 'Time Slot' dropdown is enabled and has a default value of '10:00 AM'
Verify the 'Confirm Booking' button's initial background color is #cccccc
Access 'https://www.example.com/compare-products'
Verify the comparison table displays exactly 3 product columns, each with a width of 300px
Verify the 'Feature' column header has background color #f2f2f2 and font weight 700
Verify the 'Add to Compare' button is visible, has border radius 4px, and text color #007bff
Verify each feature row has a padding of 10px and alternating background colors of #ffffff and #f9f9f9
Verify the product image's watermark is 'COMPARE'
View the news page 'https://www.example.com/news'
Verify the 'Latest News' heading is displayed with font size 38px and text color #000000
Verify exactly 4 news articles are visible
Verify each article title, like 'Company X Raises $50M', has font size 22px and font weight 600
Verify the 'Read More' link for each article has a color #007bff
Verify the article snippet text is limited to 150 characters and is aligned left
Verify the article images load within 1.2 seconds
Open 'https://www.example.com/careers'
Verify the 'Job Listings' section header has text size 30px and is aligned center
Verify the 'Apply Now' button for each job listing has background color #ffc107, text color #212529, and a border radius of 5px
Verify the job descriptions are initially truncated to 200 characters and expand fully on click with a max height change transition of 0.5s
Verify the 'Filter by Department' dropdown has placeholder 'All Departments'
Load the terms and conditions page 'https://www.example.com/terms'
Verify the main content area has width 960px and is centered horizontally with auto left/right margin
Verify section titles, such as '1. Introduction', are displayed with font size 24px and font weight 600
Verify the paragraph text has font size 16px and a color of #495057
Verify the 'I Agree' checkbox is visible, initially unchecked, and has aria-label 'I agree to the terms and conditions'
Access 'https://www.example.com/community'
Verify the 'Recent Posts' widget displays exactly 5 posts
Verify each post has a 1px solid bottom border of color #e0e0e0 and 15px vertical padding
Verify the post titles have font size 18px and text color #007bff
Verify the 'Create New Post' button has background color #17a2b8, text color #ffffff, and is positioned at top 20px, right 20px
Verify the 'Community Guidelines' link has text color #6c757d and font weight 400
Visit 'https://www.example.com/dashboard/charts'
Verify the main chart component is visible, has width 700px, and height 400px
Verify the 'Download Data' button has aria-label 'Download chart data as CSV'
Verify the chart legend items have font size 14px and text color #555555
Verify the 'Update' button has background color #007bff, text color #ffffff, and a border radius of 3px
Verify the chart title 'Sales Performance' has font size 26px and color #343a40
